message.content:
To identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period, we look for the line item representing the cost associated with the inventories sold. This is conventionally shown as "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS) in the income statement.

In the problem:

| Account           | Amount    | Date       |
|-------------------|-----------|------------|
| Cost of Goods Sold | 1684000.00| 2024-02-05 |

This amount represents the carrying amount of inventories sold during the period.

Therefore, the solution is:

```json
{"solution": {"value": "1684000.00"}}
```
